detail_desc: Small shoulder bag in soft imitation leather with a narrow, metal-chain shoulder strap and room for a credit card. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Width 10 cm. Height 8 cm.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with crossover straps at the front and lightly padded, moulded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Set in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Patterned sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ankle-length leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motifs.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist and frills at the front. Jersey lining.

prod_name: BEANIE KNIT CHUNKY FUR POM POM
detail_desc: Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a turned-up hem.

Short, A-line dress in organza crêpe with plenty of width in the skirt. Double-layered frilled collar, an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and double-layered, gathered frills around the armholes. Chiffon lining made from recycled polyester.
Low-rise trousers in washed, superstretch twill with front and back pockets and skinny legs.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lace trim at the top, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts and concealed elastication at the hem.
Puff shorts in a cotton weave with a front section and back pocket in broderie anglaise. Elasticated waist with a decorative bow and side pockets. Lined.

Short, V-neck dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a wrapover front and long puff sleeves with a button and pleated frill at the cuffs. Seam with a tie belt at the waist and a gently flared, pleated skirt. Partly lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hairband in soft jersey with a decorative knot-detail at the front.

Jacket in sturdy jersey with quilted sections at the top and on the sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in a soft viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, short raglan sleeves with a tie at the sleeve-ends, and an elasticated hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Lace tights with an elasticated waist.
Glittery ballet pumps with a heel, a patent bow and a patent strap over the foot with a hook and loop fastening at the side. Satin insoles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with appliqués on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft hole knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Straw hat with a grosgrain band. Lined. Width of brim 12 cm.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Slim Fit. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a flounce at the top that continues round the back.
Keyring in metal and faux fur. Length approx. 16 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and 3/4-length legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Weekend bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top. One zipped inner compartment and studs on the bottom. Lined. Size approx. 21x35x48 cm.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Tailored trousers in a wool blend with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and low crotch. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Long hoop earrings in metal and plastic. Length 6.2 cm.

Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hems, and press-stud fastenings.
Pleated blouse in an airy weave with frills. V-neck with ties at the neckline, concealed press-studs down the front, long sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Nightslip in patterned cotton jersey with frills at the front and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline.
Ankle-length trousers in twill with a soft brushed finish. Elasticated waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and flap leg pockets. Gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sports top in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front, unlined hood and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Extra layer in a contrasting colour at the hem. Partly lined in mesh.

Rain jacket and trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Jacket with press-studs down the front, a detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. Trousers with elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. Both the jacket and trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted top in fast-drying, functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Cardigan in soft cotton jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and side pockets.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose-knit viscose blend. No fasteners.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.

Trousers and shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waistband.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
